name: Companies with worldwide, domestic, and foreign R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company, by source of funds, industry, and company size: 2017
description: Companies with worldwide, domestic, and foreign R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company, by source of funds, industry, and company size: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_worldwide_r_d_performancea_paid_for_by_the_company
variableMeasured.description: Worldwide R D Performancea Paid For By The Company

variableMeasured.name: field_worldwide_r_d_performancea_paid_for_by_others
variableMeasured.description: Worldwide R D Performancea Paid For By Others

variableMeasured.name: field_domestic_r_d_performancea_paid_for_by_the_company
variableMeasured.description: Domestic R D Performancea Paid For By The Company

variableMeasured.name: field_domestic_r_d_performancea_paid_for_by_others
variableMeasured.description: Domestic R D Performancea Paid For By Others

variableMeasured.name: field_foreign_r_d_performancea_paid_for_by_the_company

variableMeasured.name: field_foreign_r_d_performancea_paid_for_by_others
variableMeasured.description: Foreign R D Performancea Paid For By Others

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and U.S. Census Bureau, Business Research and Development Survey, 2017.
